text: Scott Bakula (October 9, 1954) is an American actor. He is best known for his roles on the television shows, Quantum Leap and Star Trek: Enterprise. ==Filmography== * Cats Don't Dance (1997) ... Danny Cat (voice) * Looney Tunes: Back in Action (2003) ... title: Scott Bakula
